wihara mahadewi rangahale hinda ganima sandaha athi swabhawika pahasukama nisa inna senaga deguna wi penima wasidayaka swabhawayak.

janadhipathithuma, agamathithuma athulu ethanol aanayanaya thahanam kirima pilibandawa katayuthu karana siyaluma amathyawarun lankawata shri ethanol wanchanika lesa genwanawada kiyala dadi awadhanayen innawa.

shri lanka krikat aayathanaya mema masa 15 wanida puhunuwim aarambha kirimata krida amathyanshayen anumathiya illa thibunada mema krida thunatama balapawathwena paridi juni masa 1 wanida sita nawatha puhunuwim aarambha karana bawa shri lanka krikat aayathanaye pradhana widhayaka niladhari waraya pawasayi.

mema maha krikat tharaga magin pasal krikat kridikawange menma widuhalpathiwarunge unanduwada wadiwi athi bawa pawasu apsari thilakarathna mahathmiya pasugiya wasare maha krikat tharaga 10k sandaha anugrahaya dakwu bawath, mewara eya 15 dakwa wadi kala bawath pawasuwaya.
lankawe deshapalanaya thula prajathanthrawadaya shakthimath wimata iwahal wana matha kalina kriyamarga atharin uthuru palath sabha mathiwaranayata pradhana thanak himi we.
fa la ta na ma ra kata.
ru.50,000/- ka masika watupak samanga rakiyawak sandaha ayadum kirimata thawaduratath mema lipiya kiyawanna.
owun atharin da adu tharame ek ayeku ho hamuda buddhi ansha wisin polisiyata bhara nodi nidahas karana ladi.
meya mathakadi pussan wisin rangadakwanu labu saudi nadagama, dalada nadagama, bhashi madhushani wannama, nidahas chathurasra thowilaya, aadiyema apuru diguwaki.
ekak denakota dekak gannata uthsaha karanna athi.
gedara gihinma hinaweyan eekata hariyanna th ekkama . .
me ketumpatha parlimenthuwata genne naha kiyala janadhipathithuma mahanayaka himiwarunta porondu wunane.
ee ayata me thaththwaya athi.
(thaththa ehema kiyanne oya kale wenakotath ape gedara balu pataw bara ganak hitapu hinda)

mema pethsame palamu withthikaru wana hitapu parlimenthu manthri duminda silwa mahathage aarakshaka niladhariya lesa katayuthu kala anura thushara da mel namaththata erehiwa dun thinduwa iwatha damu winisuru mandulla ohuta erehi siyaluma chodanawalin ohu nidos kota nidahas kaleya.
ee ema apekshikawa wisin pasugiya (02) polisiyata karana lada paminillakata anuwaya.
ese sithenne, ihatha ki samaja sanshodhana kisiwak, owunge wen wimata hethu karana washayen idiripath nokerunu bawini.
prasanga wedikawedi gayana siyalu githa obema eewada?
janadhipathithumage mama dakina gathi lakshana kima, ethuma warnana kirimakda?
hitapu amerikanu janadhipathi joj bushta erehiwa rsawaloka adhikarana balaya bhawitha kale wyawastha ayithin pilibanda madhyasthanaya wisini.
kiyanna bari nam mukuthma nokiya hitiyath kamak naha.
apage pudgalikathwa prathipaththiyehi sandahan hara wena kisiwekutath apa oba wetha laba dena wisthara apa kawadawath laba nodenu atha.
eya hudek ee ee deshapalana pakshawala mathiwarana wyaparayange hudu sarasillak pamani.
in pasuwayi honda hariya….
